titleStmt.title: Humble motiues for association to maintaine religion established Published as an antidote against the pestilent treatises of secular priests.
titleStmt.author: Diggs, Thomas, Gentleman.
Balmford, James, b. 1556, attributed name.
Bradshaw, William, 1571-1618, attributed name.

notesStmt.note: The first petition signed "Thomas Diggs Gentleman"; the second, unsigned, is possibly by James Balmford.
This edition is gathered in 4s, and has "effects" in last line of p. 2.
Identified as STC 6873 on UMI microfilm reel 1446.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
